description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Modal' which renders a customizable modal dialog with optional footer content. It handles keyboard events for closing on Escape key and supports backdrop click to close.

methods.name: Modal({ open, title, children, onClose, footer })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a modal dialog, handling open/close state and accessibility properties.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export function Modal({ open, title, children, onClose, footer }) {$/
